summary: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.
cast: Anna Karina|Danièle Girard|Louisa Colpeyn|Chantal Darget|Sami Frey|Claude Brasseur|Georges Staquet|Ernest Menzer|Jean-Claude Rémoleux|Michel Delahaye|Louis Jojot|Claude Makovski|Michèle Seghers|Jean-Luc Godard
keywords: burglary|the madison dance|french new wave|love triangle|nouvelle vague
title: Banda aparte
